title: Diary of Steve the Noob 13 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: This Minecraft diary is 11,000 words long with 27 pictures to accompany the entries. Steve was just saved from the wither... by another human? Whuuuut? And she's a girl? Huuuuh? But who is she? Where did she come from? And why did she kill the wither? Read #13 today to find out what happens next. This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
